segments.text: Excuse me , Mr . Graham ? I have something I need to discuss with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m in a bit of a hurry , Louise . Can it wait ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would really appreciate it if we could talk for a few minutes now . It ’ s about the overtime you ’ Ve asked me to put in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Why don ’ t you have a seat ? What ’ s the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2
